items.title: Microsoft just unleashed a trio of new Breaker series special edition Xbox wireless controllers
items.summary:
Microsoft has just unleashed three brand-new special edition controllers – Heart Breaker, Ice Breaker, and Storm Breaker. Unlike the Cipher series, which launched one at a time, all three of the new Breaker series models are debuting together for the very first time. From metallic coatings to frosted translucent elements, these controllers are unlike anything we’ve seen in official Xbox controller lineup, so be sure to grab them after getting a closer look below. Amazon already has placeholder listings for the trio, with full details expected to go live soon, so keep an eye out.

items.title: Brazil's Congress clears new fiscal rule for court-ordered debt payments
items.summary: BRASILIA (Reuters) -Brazil's Senate has approved a constitutional amendment that will gradually include court-ordered debt payments in fiscal target calculations starting in 2027, easing fiscal pressure ahead of next year's presidential election. Read full story

The latter of these two commuters goes for $1,899 at full price, which we’ve only seen fall as low as $1,599 in past years, while keeping above $1,649 in 2025. You’re looking at a combined $400 markdown that lands the cost $100 under the previous low that last popped up in early 2024, giving folks a short-term window at the best new price that we have tracked. You’ll also be getting a free bell and 3X PowerBoost Smart SuperCharger ($321 value) thrown in for $721 in total savings.

items.title: Logitech Woot sale is back at up to 67% off! Mac and gaming accessories from just $9
items.summary:
Woot is back with another sale, offering a wide range of Logitech peripherals, accessories, and more at some of their best prices ever. This sale event covers everything from Mac and iPad accessories to gaming peripherals, with deals starting at just $9. Most items are brand new, but you’ll also find open-box steals delivering deeper discounts like Logitech’s regularly $100 MX Keys Mini Wireless Keyboard down at $62.99 Prime shipped. What makes this sale even better is that you can use code LOGITECHFIVE at checkout for an extra $5 off for a limited time. Continue reading to get all the details.
